extendedInfo.description: You have to calculate exactly or as close as possible to a random number.You get 6 random numbers that you can combine with each other mathematically.You will have 80 seconds to do so.Score points in 5 rounds and try to register your name in the table of world scores.It's a quiet, simple and fun math game.And the games are fast, ideal for hang out.A game of figures and no letters, only numbers.It is a free game of mental calculation.Use your brain in this arithmetic free game.Calculate the number, with numbers & without letters.Like a maths tv contest or math show.No letters and numbers only.If you like numbers and math games this is your game, and it's free.Compete against the world and prove you're the best & the fastest in mental calculation.
